About Us

Design Bureau Architect Expert LLC specializes in the comprehensive management of investment and construction projects for industrial and civil facilities

Additionally, we provide:

  • Support in obtaining expert reports
  • Author’s and technical supervision during construction
  • Comprehensive technical inspection of buildings and structures (including industrial facilities) with a technical assessment report on the condition of structures.
